org.eclipse.kura.net.wifi

Class WifiConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.kura.net.wifi.WifiConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetConfig

    public class WifiConfig
extends Object
implements NetConfig
    Configuration for a wifi interface based on IPv4 addresses.
